channel.title: Mk2 and mk3 pipes
channel.description: Is there a mod that had pipes with increased flow? The vanilla mk1 is severly limiting, eventhough they increased tank volumes to abotu 4-5x they did not add any decent pipes.

item.title: Mk2 and mk3 pipes
item.dc:creator: @Andre_Aquila DellAquila
item.description:
@Andre_Aquila wrote:

Hi Jimbodiah,
For now we dont have a mk2 pipe, but thereâ€™s some people working on them.

If you like, you can use the Half Volume Fluids to simulate it with water and oil.

I hope we get this soon
